summary:
I I hold dual master's degrees in clinical technology (Twente) and medical doctor-clinical investigator (Maastricht) and am currently in training to become a cardiologist (since 2018).

I have developed a special interest in cardiac modeling and electro-anatomic mapping in biventricular pacemaker therapy and have combined research in Maastricht and Lugano with my clinical training. 
I received the Dekker Clinical scientist research grant (Dutch Heart Foundation) in 2022 to conduct research in the field of electrocardiographic imaging. 

I hope to become a caring cardiologist and to combine clinical work with research.

For this purpose we will use computer modelling and electrocardiographic imaging; a relatively new technique that can be interpreted as a very extensive electrocardiogram.
